mdRecord.dcterms:description: Discussion of Phi Kappa Psi fraternity (the one implicated in a retracted Rolling Stone article on rape culture at UVA); responses via crossing out and addition to/modification of original comment as well. [work]
Student graffiti art and messages inscribed on carrel walls in the new stacks, Alderman Library, University of Virginia, prior to the renovation of the building, 2020-2023. [host]
↑ LOL @ whiny rich boys | ro ← it's def per... | Phi Psi is being p-er-secuted in a --modern day witch hunt!-- | ↑True ↑probably feel stupid now _criminal proceeding_ | ↑yes!
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Greek letter societies
Crime
